summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Harbor Avenue Southwest, from West Spokane Street to north line of West Florida Street on the east; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 8658 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
